name: Balinese (2011)
description:
This artwork was made in 2011 using watercolor, Pen and Mix Media on a paper using the Pointilis technique.

This artwork is a representation of the island of Bali with diversity and natural wealth to their culture.
In the eyes of the international people, the island of Bali is so beautiful, so eccentric and exotic because of its natural and cultural authenticity. Maybe some of them don't know Indonesia, but get to know Bali. However, now Bali has changed a lot of culture, nature, and the habit of continuing to change and shift as many people come there.

In this artwork I want to describe the condition (in 2011) when I visited there. Hopefully Bali remains good even though it is attacked by modern and can survive and beautiful until anytime.

Throwback Artwork
By Fadhlilabdi
